content: I will suggest a number of projects related to Stone duality in my talk , you can look at the very last slide if you want spoilers! And come talk to me.

List of possible projects (see my talk this afternoon for details):

  1. Cut down the sober-spatial equivalence
  2. Complete the proof of Birkhoff's theorem
  3. The various equivalent definitions of profinite types
  4. Work towards the Mile-Stones
  5. For the brave: (Finite) Hochster's theorem
  6. Priestley duality
  7. Open mapping theorem and semantic interpolation
